featured.text: The speaker was Robot Redford, a robot who delivered the commencement address at a community college in suburban Maryland.

definition.zh_def: 開始，特別是指正式的開始儀式，如畢業典禮。
definition.en_def: The beginning or start of something, especially a formal ceremony such as a graduation.
definition.example: The commencement ceremony will take place on Saturday.
